country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.999
	is_triggered_only = yes

			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.050
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = MAPMODE_refresh
	}
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				5154 = {
					has_province_flag = farm_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
			}
			every_province = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_wasteland = yes
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_modifier
					0_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 0_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					5_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 5_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					10_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 10_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					15_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 15_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					20_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 20_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					25_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 25_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					30_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 30_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE

					35_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 35_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE

					40_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 40_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					45_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 45_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					50_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 50_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					55_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 55_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					60_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 60_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE

						remove_province_modifier = 75_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
					80_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
						remove_province_modifier = 80_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_modifier
					0_percent_efficiency = {
						remove_province_modifier = 0_percent_efficiency
					}
					5_percent_efficiency = {
						remove_province_modifier = 5_percent_efficiency
					}
					10_percent_efficiency = {
						remove_province_modifier = 10_percent_efficiency
					}
					15_percent_efficiency = {
						remove_province_modifier = 15_percent_efficiency
					}
					20_percent_efficiency = {
						remove_province_modifier = 20_percent_efficiency

							}

									value = 1.3
								}
							}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.100
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.100.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.100.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.100.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.110
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.100.b"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.120
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.100.c"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.130
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = back
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = exit
		highlight = yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.111
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.111.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.111.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		5154 = {
			clr_province_flag = farm_efficiency_MAPMODE
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				is_city = yes
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0_percent_efficiency
				}
				5_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 5_percent_efficiency
				}
				10_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 10_percent_efficiency
				}
				15_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 15_percent_efficiency
				}
				20_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 20_percent_efficiency
				}
				25_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 25_percent_efficiency
				}
				30_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 30_percent_efficiency
				}
				35_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 35_percent_efficiency
				}
				40_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 40_percent_efficiency
				}
				45_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 45_percent_efficiency
				}
				50_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 50_percent_efficiency
				}
				55_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 55_percent_efficiency
				}
				60_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 60_percent_efficiency
				}
				65_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 65_percent_efficiency
				}
				70_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 70_percent_efficiency
				}
				75_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 75_percent_efficiency
				}
				80_percent_efficiency = {
					remove_province_modifier = 80_percent_efficiency
				}
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				5_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 5_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				10_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 10_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				15_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 15_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				20_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 20_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				25_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 25_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				30_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 30_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE
				}
				35_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 35_percent_efficiency_MAPMODE

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = back
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = exit
		highlight = yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.121

	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		5154 = {
			set_province_flag = weather_MAPMODE
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_wasteland = yes
				}
			}
			if = {

							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_province_modifier
								60_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 60_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								70_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 70_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								80_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								90_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								100_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								110_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								120_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 120_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								130_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 130_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								140_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 140_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 110_weather_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_province_modifier
								60_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 60_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								70_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 70_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								80_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								90_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								100_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								110_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								120_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 120_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								130_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 130_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								140_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 140_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = local_weather_factor
							value = 0.7
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = local_weather_factor
								value = 0.8
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = local_weather_factor
									value = 0.9
								}
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
									}
								}
								trigger_switch = {
									on_trigger = has_province_modifier
									60_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 60_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									70_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 70_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									80_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									90_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									100_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									110_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									120_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 120_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									130_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 130_weather_MAPMODE

									140_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 140_weather_MAPMODE
									}
								}
								add_permanent_province_modifier = {
									name = 90_weather_MAPMODE
									duration = -1
								}
							}
						}
						else = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										has_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE
									}
								}
								trigger_switch = {
									on_trigger = has_province_modifier
									60_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 60_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									70_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 70_weather_MAPMODE

									80_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE

									90_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									100_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
									}
									110_weather_MAPMODE = {
										remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE

										remove_province_modifier = 120_weather_MAPMODE

										remove_province_modifier = 130_weather_MAPMODE

									140_weather_MAPMODE = {

								}
								add_permanent_province_modifier = {
									name = 80_weather_MAPMODE
									duration = -1

							}
						}
					}
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = 70_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_province_modifier
								60_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 60_weather_MAPMODE

								70_weather_MAPMODE = {

									remove_province_modifier = 80_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								90_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								100_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								110_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								120_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 120_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								130_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 130_weather_MAPMODE

									remove_province_modifier = 140_weather_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 70_weather_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = local_weather_factor
								value = 0.6
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {

							trigger_switch = {

									remove_province_modifier = 90_weather_MAPMODE
								}
								100_weather_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 100_weather_MAPMODE
								}

									remove_province_modifier = 110_weather_MAPMODE

							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 60_weather_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.121.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.130
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.130.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.130.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	immediate = {}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.130.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.131
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.130.b"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.132
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.130.c"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.133
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = back
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.100
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = exit
		highlight = yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.131
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.131.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.131.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		5154 = {
			clr_province_flag = excess_food_MAPMODE
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					is_wasteland = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_modifier
					10_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 10_regional_food
					}
					20_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 20_regional_food
					}
					30_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 30_regional_food
					}
					40_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 40_regional_food
					}
					50_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 50_regional_food
					}
					60_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 60_regional_food
					}
					70_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 70_regional_food
					}
					80_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 80_regional_food
					}
					90_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 90_regional_food
					}
					100_regional_food = {
						remove_province_modifier = 100_regional_food
					}
				}
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				10_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 10_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				20_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 20_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				30_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 30_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				40_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 40_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				50_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 50_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				60_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 60_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				70_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 70_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				80_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 80_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				90_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 90_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
				100_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 100_regional_food_MAPMODE
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.131.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}

								60_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 60_regional_food_MAPMODE
								}
								70_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 70_regional_food_MAPMODE
								}
								80_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 80_regional_food_MAPMODE
								}
								90_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 90_regional_food_MAPMODE
								}
								100_regional_food_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 100_regional_food_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 10_regional_food_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.133.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}

		}

		name = back
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ai = no

		}

		highlight = yes

			factor = 0
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.231
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.231.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.231.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		5154 = {
			clr_province_flag = rural_production_power_MAPMODE
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				is_city = yes
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0.01_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.01_rural_production_power_display
				}
				0.25_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.25_rural_production_power_display
				}
				0.5_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_power_display
				}
				1_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1_rural_production_power_display
				}
				2_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 2_rural_production_power_display
				}
				3_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 3_rural_production_power_display
				}
				4_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 4_rural_production_power_display
				}
				6_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 6_rural_production_power_display
				}
				8_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 8_rural_production_power_display
				}
				12_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 12_rural_production_power_display
				}
				16_rural_production_power_display = {
					remove_province_modifier = 16_rural_production_power_display
				}
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0.01_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.01_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				0.25_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.25_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				0.5_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				1_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				2_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 2_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				3_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 3_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				4_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 4_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				6_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 6_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				8_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 8_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				12_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 12_rural_production_power_MAPMODE
				}
				16_rural_production_power_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 16_rural_production_power_MAPMODE

		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.241
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.241.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.241.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		5154 = {
			clr_province_flag = rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				is_city = yes
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0.5_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_maturity
				}
				0.6_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.6_rural_production_maturity
				}
				0.7_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.7_rural_production_maturity
				}
				0.8_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.8_rural_production_maturity
				}
				0.9_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.9_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1.1_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.1_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1.2_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.2_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1.3_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.3_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1.4_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.4_rural_production_maturity
				}
				1.5_rural_production_maturity = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.5_rural_production_maturity
				}
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_modifier
				0.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}

					remove_province_modifier = 0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				0.7_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.7_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				0.8_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.8_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				0.9_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 0.9_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE

				1.1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				1.2_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
					remove_province_modifier = 1.2_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
				}
				1.3_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {

									remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}

								}

								1.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {

								}
							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {
								name = 0.7_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = rural_production_power_industry_size
								value = 0.6
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									has_province_modifier = 0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = {
								on_trigger = has_province_modifier
								0.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.6_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								0.7_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.7_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								0.8_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.8_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								0.9_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 0.9_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1.1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 1.1_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1.2_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 1.2_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1.3_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 1.3_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1.4_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
									remove_province_modifier = 1.4_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
								}
								1.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {

							}
							add_permanent_province_modifier = {

							}
							1.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE = {
								remove_province_modifier = 1.5_rural_production_maturity_MAPMODE
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.243.a"
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
		}
	}

		}
	}
	option = {
		name = back
		highlight = yes
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		country_event = {
			id = POP_special_MAPMODE.300
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = exit
		highlight = yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_special_MAPMODE.700
	title = POP_special_MAPMODE.700.t
	desc = POP_special_MAPMODE.700.d
	picture = REFORM_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = no
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.700.a"
		hidden_effect = {
			5154 = {
				set_province_flag = minorities_MAPMODE
			}
			every_province = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_wasteland = yes
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = catholic
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = catholic
								value = 8
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_flag
							catholic_accepted_MAP = {
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = catholic_minority_8_accepted_MAPMODE
									duration = -1
								}
							}
							catholic_tolerated_MAP = {
								add_province_modifier = {
									name = catholic_minority_8_tolerated_MAPMODE
									duration = -1
								}
							}
							catholic_persecuted_MAP = {

					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_minority_6
					}
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = heretic_minority_6_MAPMODE
						duration = -1
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = heretic_minority_8
					}
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = heretic_minority_8_MAPMODE
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_special_MAPMODE.700.b"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = POP_special_MAPMODE.001
			}
		}
	}
}
